title: Test Prep
description: This recipe is a test for the recipe blog website.
html:
Test Prep

Ingredients

100g flour

1 stick butter

2 pinches of salt

4 limes

Conclusion

This is a very tasty recipe and you will enjoy it a lot if you make it properly.

title: Mango Matho
description: Fluffy, airy, and luxuriously creamy mango flavoured delicacy.
html:
Ingredients

- Heavy Cream

- Mango Puree

- Saffron

- Vanilla Jello Pudding Mix

- Dry Fruits: Pistachio, Cashews, Almonds

- Cardamom Powder

- Fruits (Optional): Strawberries, Mangoes, Peaches, Red Grapes

- Optionally Cream Cheese

Steps

Preparation:
1. Wash and thoroughly dry fruits
2. Thinly chop the dry fruits
3. Cut the fruits into pea size

Mixing:
1. In a stand mixer, add the heavy cream and Jello pudding and if preferred a little bit of cream cheese whip till stiff peaks form
2. Add in the mango puree
3. Gently mix using the eightfold method with a spatula forming a smooth creamy consistency
4. Add in the cardamom powder, saffron, and dry fruits keeping some as garnish and add in all the fresh fruits
5. Serve in preferred cup or bowl (it's healthy but in limits)
6. Add the remaining dry fruits as garnish
7. Remember to take a PICTURE!
